intro: Oreocharis latisepala, commonly known as the broad-sepal oreocharis, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, commonly known as the orchid family. The plant is characterized by its delicate, showy flowers that typically feature a white or pale pink coloration. Its leaves are usually lance-shaped and arranged in a basal rosette. Oreocharis latisepala is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests or rocky slopes.
